law.catch_line: Department's powers in operation and administration of Kentucky Access.
law.text:
In its duties to operate and administer Kentucky Access, the department may, through itself or third parties:
Exercise any and all powers granted to insurers under this chapter; and
Sue or be sued.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1277, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 476, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000.
